news_header: Russian drone strikes hit Kyiv, causing damage but no injuries reported.
news_text: Overnight Russian drone strikes in Kyiv resulted in significant destruction, damaging buildings, roads, and power lines, but no injuries were reported. The military administration noted that debris from the drones affected multiple areas, including the Shevchenkivskyi and Holosiivskyi districts. Ukrainian air defense successfully intercepted 66 drones and a missile during the attack. This assault occurred amidst reports of intensified Russian offensives in Ukraine, with the military indicating they are resisting one of the strongest attacks since the invasion began in February 2022.
